about_the_game:
Ortunia Mysteries - Where Did Everybody Go? - A 3D Escape Room Style puzzle game set in the town of Ortunia.

You are Draiven.  Your healing skills have been requested by your friend Joran.  You are to meet Joran at the Unsettled Dragon: an inn near the heart of Ortunia.  However, upon arrival, not only is Joran nowhere to be found, but there is no one there.  Where did everybody go?

Starting with a letter left by Joran in the inn, you will find clues, solve puzzles, find secrets, and escape from mazes. 

Follow your friend and his companions; discover what is chasing them and why.  Are you up to the task?

Ortunia Mysteries contains 5 Chapters

Chapter 1: The Inn
Chapter 2: The Maze
Chapter 3: The Catacombs
Chapter 4: The Cathedral
Chapter 5: The Conclusion

Find Clues, Discover Secrets

Joran is leaving you clues when he can.  Other clues in each room will help you solve the current puzzle.  Solving the puzzle progresses the story and leads you closer to your destination.

What about secret rooms?  Can you find them all?

name: Ortunia Mysteries: Where Did Everybody Go?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K 3.50GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A first person escape room game. Welcome to Ortunia! Your friend needs your help! Navigate through an inn, some catacombs, a cathedral and more, while solving puzzles and finding secrets. Discover what is chasing your friend and his companions and why they are being chased.
